DOC.brief_summary: We will collect blood samples from patients with the diagnosis of sepsis and other ICU patients. We will describe the course of different mediator levels and organ injury markers and follow their progression throughout the course of the study.
DOC.brief_title: Indicators of Inflammation and Coagulation in Sepsis
DOC.detailed_description: After informed consent is obtained 5 cc of blood is collected on the day of admission and on days 0, 1, 3, and 7 thereafter. Plasma is collected and frozen for the subsequent measurement of biomarkers.
DOC.criteria: Admission to the ICU No blood draws scheduled Hemoglobin level < 6,5 gm/dl
